vote.title: Authorize a contract in support of Artist's Design Anaisa Franco Nascimento d/b/a Anaisa Franco Studio, LLC for 6805 Patrol Way, Dallas, Texas 75241 - Not to exceed $300,000.00 - Financing: Public Works Art Bond Funds Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($181,000.00) and Flood Protection and Storm Drainage Facilities Fund (2006 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($119,000.00)
